data.title: Miami Train Station: High-Speed Rail
data.meta_description: Book your ticket at Brightlineâ€™s Miami Train Station today. Learn more about the station amenities, points of interest, transit connections & more.
data.text:
Miami Airport

Operates daily and departs 10 minutes after southbound train arrivals. Includes the following stops:

Miami International Airport

Terminals D, E, G, F, H, J

*Due to construction at MIA International Airport, our pickup/drop off locations have been temporarily moved to Level 2 Departures.

The new shuttle stops are located at

North Terminal, Concourse D, Door 6, Bus Zone 1

Central Terminal, Concourse E, Door 11, Bus Zone 2

South Terminal, Concourse H, Door 22, Bus Zone 4

Service hours

Daily: 7:00am - 8:00pm

Pricing
